## Introduction
Crimtab is a dataset that holds statistical data of 3000 criminals

* rownames contain the length of their left middle finger (in cm)
* colnames contain the height of the criminals (in cm)

The goal here is to apply statistical analysis using R programming to the dataset, then compiling the results into a slide using R markdown.
